questions.quote: You know, I really liked her. We talked. We flirted. And when she left, she reached out and touched my arm.
Well, now that we have that cleared up.. why don't the three of us have lunch.
I think your taking the trash out for this chicken place, but that couldn't be.
I just don't like the idea that any time there's a dinner invitation there's this annoying little chore that goes along with it.
Well, maybe because we were sitting in the right field stands cursing at him in the bullpen all game.
Jerry and George called me from this limo and they said we're all going to the Knicks-Bulls game.
What, are you crazy? I can't have a man touching me. Switch with me.
You don't need the air conditioner. So, you have your speech all ready?
George, I got something for you.  I'm suppose to find a charity and throw some of the company's money at it. They all seem the same to me, so, what's the difference?
Well, sorry I missed that, uh, charity thing. But this was one of those truly glorious Hampton weekends that you always hear about.
